Class SCXMLFrontier

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Frontier

    public class SCXMLFrontier
extends org.apache.commons.scxml.SCXMLExecutor
implements Frontier
    Frontier implementation for generating data with SCXML state machine models.
